column3: “Decent strain and size for 1 gram. Good head change. Worth the price. THC: 26.39% CBD: 0.54%.”

“A bright, happy strain. Everything seemed better & brighter after smoking this. Loved it! And even though there was no couch lock I was pretty relaxed. i smoked it once before & was not as impressed but THC was almost 10% higher in this one, probably why. Anyways, good mood booster for sure!!! :]”
“Happy uplifted strain, Nice head high, not much of body buzz.”

“Got high enough to watch Bobs Butgers ...on cable and watch entire episode with commercials and be happy . However not high enough where I’m zoned out in Bobs Burgers , I still surfed to see what else was on. Good strain that I’d honestly get if my go to is sold out . However end of day it’s not the same .”
“Great day time strain. Citrus notes. Complex aftertaste. Very uplifting.”
“great pick me up strain. happy,clear,head high. great earthy taste. buds full of resin. beautiful smoke👍👍”
